projects.projectDescription: Full-stack marketplace mobile app with an AWS backend and MySQL database.
bulletPoints: Built and deployed a React Native app for a campus marketplace.
Implemented backend services on AWS with a MySQL database.
Ensured reliable data flow between the mobile client and backend.
Designed system from end-to-end and acheieved > 90% test coverage.
Dockerized a React/Express application for consistent deployments.
Deployed and managed the service on AWS EC2.
Integrated Musixmatch API to fetch song lyrics.

projects.projectDescription: Implemented backend components and interfaces for a nonprofit safety app as part of Change Plus Plus.
bulletPoints: Implemented MongoDB controllers, models, and routers.
Built a server-client interface to abstract front-end access to backend services.
Collaborated within an Agile Scrum team to deliver features securely and reliably.

projects.projectDescription: Python tool that summarizes daily emails using local LLMs with chain-of-thought prompting.
bulletPoints: Leveraged local LLMs to generate concise daily email digests.
Applied chain-of-thought and few-shot prompting to improve summary quality.

projects.projectDescription: Developed mobile app features focused on authentication and content posting for a nonprofit.
bulletPoints: Developed React Native user registration flow.
Built post creation and display system.
Implemented authentication with Firebase Authentication.
Built a scalable Spring Boot batch job to automate Jira ticket creation, reducing Scrum Master workload by 15%.
Defined MongoDB schemas and multi-table SQL queries while guiding a peer through API integration and system design.
Met enterprise code standards via senior engineer code reviews and achieved 96% unit test coverage.
Evolved a text-to-SQL chatbot into an LLM agent workflow using vector search and few-shot prompting.
Drove over 90% cost reduction and a 45% accuracy increase through iterative improvements.
Communicated progress in stand-ups and product demos to developers and executives.

jobs.projectName: Vanderbilt University Department of Computer Science
jobs.projectDescription: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant – Programming Languages | Programming and Problem-Solving (Aug 2023 – Present)
bulletPoints: Conduct 3 weekly office hours, providing one-on-one assistance and troubleshooting code.
Assist in grading assignments, projects, and exams for courses with 225+ students.
Teach and clarify paradigms across a wide range of programming languages.
